alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Jones; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 12:36PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jones, eastern Craven, southwestern Beaufort, west central Carteret and Pamlico Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from River Road to Peletier. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Havelock, Washington, Morehead City, River Road, James City, Ransomville, Blounts Creek, Askins, Cayton, Janeiro, Edward, Grantsboro, Royal, Bonnerton, Cox Crossroads, Riverdale, Bayview, Olympia and Croatan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Jones; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret
